title: News24.com | Trump says China virus deaths 'far higher' after Wuhan toll revised up
description: After the toll in the city where the pandemic originated was revised up by 50%, US President Donald Trump lashed out saying the nationâs coronavirus deaths were "far higher" than it has admitted
content:
US President Donald Trump said on Friday that China's
coronavirus deaths were "far higher" than it has admitted after the
toll in the city where the pandemic originated was revised up by 50%.
Global criticism is mounting against China over its
management … [+7106 chars]
